data.fullContent: Mario Sports Mix features five sports: volleyball, field hockey, ice hockey, dodgeball, and basketball. Each sport features special moves that the characters can use. Both local and online multiplayer can be played. The game features characters from the Mario, Final Fantasy, and Dragon Quest series. Players can also play as their Mii characters.
data.answer: 《马里奥运动》包含五个运动项目:排球、曲棍球、冰球、躲避球和篮球。每种运动都有角色可以使用的特殊动作。本地和在线多人游戏都可以玩。这款游戏的角色来自《马里奥》、《最终幻想》和《龙的任务》系列。玩家也可以扮演他们的Mii角色。
